Build I20021216

1) In the variables view, open the variable filters dialog.
2) Close the dialog
3) Try to open a java breakpoint properties dialog

The dialog fails to open.  The error is:

java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException:
ImageRegistry key already in use: breakpoint_preference_dialog_title_image
	at org.eclipse.jface.resource.ImageRegistry.put(ImageRegistry.java:123)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.actions.JavaBreakpointPropertiesDialog.<clinit>(JavaBreakpointPropertiesDialog.java:105)

The same image key is defined in both JavaBreakpointPropertiesDialog and
JavaVariablesFilterPreferenceDialog.

traces.message: ImageRegistry key already in use: breakpoint_preference_dialog_title_image
